fields.name: naturetrust
fields.desc: The Red Dead Redemption 2: Ultimate Edition delivers all the Story Mode content from the Special Edition plus additional bonuses for Red Dead Online.\n\nUpgrade to the Red Dead Redemption 2: NatureTrust Edition to gain unique access to exclusive in-game content for Story Mode and additional bonuses for Red Dead Online. This edition is only available through our store.
fields.helper_text: Red Dead Online is included in every version

fields.name: ultimate
fields.desc: The Red Dead Redemption 2: Ultimate Edition delivers all the Story Mode content from the Special Edition plus additional bonuses for Red Dead Online.\n\nUpgrade to the Red Dead Redemption 2: NatureTrust Edition to gain unique access to exclusive in-game content for Story Mode and additional bonuses for Red Dead Online. This edition is only available through our store.
fields.helper_text: Red Dead Online is included in every version

fields.name: standard
fields.desc:
The Standard Edition includes both Story Mode and Red Dead Online.

Upgrade to Ultimate Edition or NatureTrust Edition to exclusive in-game benefits.

Upgrade to the Red Dead Redemption 2: NatureTrust Edition to gain unique access to exclusive in-game content for Story Mode and additional bonuses for Red Dead Online. This edition is only available through our store.
fields.helper_text: Red Dead Online is included in every version

fields.name: red_dead_online
fields.desc:
Step into the vibrant, ever-evolving world of Red Dead Online and experience life in frontier America. Chase down bounties, battle outlaw gangs and other players, hunt, fish and trade, search for exotic treasures, run Moonshine, and much more to discover in a world of astounding depth and detail.

Upgrade to either Standard Edition, Ultimate Edition, or NatureTrust Edition to gain access to story-mode and other in-game benefits.

Upgrade to the Red Dead Redemption 2: NatureTrust Edition to gain unique access to exclusive in-game content for Story Mode and additional bonuses for Red Dead Online. This edition is only available through our store.
fields.helper_text: Red Dead Redemption 2: Story Mode sold separately. Internet connection required.

fields.name: standard
fields.desc: Build a world for wildlife in Planet Zoo. Construct detailed habitats, manage your zoo, and meet authentic living animals who think, feel and explore the world you create around them.
fields.helper_text: This edition includes the base game only

fields.name: deluxe
fields.desc: Planet Zoo Deluxe Edition includes the Planet Zoo base game, with additional bonus digital content.\n\nThe Deluxe Edition grants access to the Planet Zoo base game plus the following bonus digital content:
fields.helper_text: This edition includes the base game plus bonus content

fields.name: premium
fields.desc: Build a world for wildlife in Planet Zoo. Construct detailed habitats, manage your zoo, and meet authentic living animals who think, feel and explore the world you create around them.\n\nThe Premium Edition grants access to the Planet Zoo base game and all DLCS.
fields.helper_text: This edition includes the base game and all DLCS

fields.name: naturetrust
fields.desc: Build a world for wildlife in Planet Zoo. Construct detailed habitats, manage your zoo, and meet authentic living animals who think, feel and explore the world you create around them.\n\nThe NatureTrust Edition grants access to the Planet Zoo base game, the Deluxe Edition bonus content and exclusive content only available through our store.
fields.helper_text: This edition includes the base game plus exclusive bonus content

fields.name: naturetrust_premium
fields.desc: Build a world for wildlife in Planet Zoo. Construct detailed habitats, manage your zoo, and meet authentic living animals who think, feel and explore the world you create around them.\n\nThe NatureTrust Edition grants access to the Planet Zoo base game plus all DLCS, the Deluxe Edition bonus content and exclusive content only available through our store.
fields.helper_text: This edition includes the base game, all DLCS and exlusive bonus content
